title: Graves bypassing Teemo's blind
body:
Playing teemo since some season 1 or 2, I've noticed a numerous occasions where teemo's bind would be ignored by champion auto attacks.
I know the travel time of the blind leading to post attack animation status effect might be the case for some, but the rest are just ridiculous.
So I decided to show what it's like in hopes that maybe, just maybe it might be fixed?
